body_html:
hmmm, could you try the pip based install (see instructions on pytorch.org ). Maybe conda.anaconda.org is blocked in your network.
Since there is not much we can do at pytorch end, i am closing the issue.

body:
hmmm, could you try the `pip` based install (see instructions on pytorch.org ). Maybe conda.anaconda.org is blocked in your network.
Since there is not much we can do at pytorch end, i am closing the issue.
